name: Pirate Captain
description: A medium humanoid skilled in combat and navigation, the Pirate Captain wields a scimitar and daggers, showcasing agility and combat readiness.
memorable: Unique ability to navigate waters expertly and use both melee and ranged attacks effectively.
goals: To commandeer ships and lead crews, dominate maritime encounters.
relations: Often commands a crew of pirates and interacts with other nautical-themed creatures.
environment: Typically found in coastal areas or aboard ships.
strengths: High dexterity allows for effective dodging and maneuverability in combat; skilled in various physical and social activities.
weaknesses: Moderate mental stats; average perception may make them susceptible to unnoticed threats.
attacks: Attacks twice with a scimitar, dealing slashing damage, and can also throw daggers for piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Seawise ability grants expertise on maritime skill checks, enhancing navigation and ship handling.
senses: Has a passive perception of 11, which is average for detecting hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Deception, and Stealth, enhancing their versatility in both combat and social interactions.
additional_information: Uses Parry reaction to boost Armor Class.
Can perform multiattacks for increased damage output.
Shows strong capabilities in physical feats through Athletics and Acrobatics.
Adept at intimidation and deception in social encounters.
Navigates well in maritime settings due to Seawise ability.
test_queries: pirate captain who excels at sea
